what: A Modern and Flexible Data Pipeline for SurveyCTO
title: A Modern and Flexible Data Pipeline for SurveyCTO
text: modern flexible R client SurveyCTO REST API, mobile offline data collection platform, providing modern consistent interface programmatic access server resources. Built top httr2 package, enables secure efficient data retrieval returns analysis-ready data optional tidying. includes functions create, upload, download server datasets, addition fetching form data, files, submission attachments. Robust authentication request handling make package suitable automated survey monitoring downstream analysis. package built robustness efficiency mind, aiming streamline workflow researchers data analysts rely SurveyCTO. automating retrieval data, attachments, server metadata, ctoclient allows focus analysis rather manual data management. Whether running daily monitoring dashboards final impact evaluations, tool ensures data pipeline reproducible reliable. welcome contributions community! encounter bug, feature request, want improve documentation, please feel free open issue submit pull request.

title: A Modern and Flexible Data Pipeline for SurveyCTO
text: can install stable version ctoclient: development version:
code: install.packages("ctoclient") # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("GutUrago/ctoclient")  # or   # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("GutUrago/ctoclient")

title: A Modern and Flexible Data Pipeline for SurveyCTO
text: avoid hard-coding credentials scripts, highly recommended store SurveyCTO server details .Renviron file. Run usethis::edit_r_environ() open environment file. Add credentials: Restart R.
code: SERVER="myorganization.surveycto.com" USER="myemail@example.com" PASS="mypassword"

title: A Modern and Flexible Data Pipeline for SurveyCTO
code: library(ctoclient)  # Connect using environment variables (recommended) cto_connect(   server    = Sys.getenv("SERVER"),   user      = Sys.getenv("USER"),   password  = Sys.getenv("PASS") )  # Verify connection if (cto_is_connected()) {   message("Successfully connected to SurveyCTO!") }

title: A Modern and Flexible Data Pipeline for SurveyCTO
text: Download form definitions, raw data, attachments. Export functions cto_*
code: # List all available forms forms <- cto_form_ids()  # Get metadata form for specific form cto_form_metadata('myform')  # Download data for a specific form data <- cto_form_data("myform")  # Download form submission medias cto_form_data_attachment('myform', ends_with('_img'), "mykey")  # Download the default form import do-file cto_form_stata_template('myform')  # Build custom Stata import do-file cto_form_dofile('myform', "form.do")  # Download attachments (e.g., photos, audio) cto_form_attachment("myform", dir = "data/attachments", overwrite = TRUE)

title: A Modern and Flexible Data Pipeline for SurveyCTO
text: Manage server-side datasets.
code: # List existing datasets datasets <- cto_dataset_list()  # Create server dataset cto_dataset_create("mydata")  # Upload a local CSV to a server dataset cto_dataset_upload("mydata", "data/mydata.csv")  # Download a server dataset to a local file cto_dataset_download(dir = "data/downloads", overwrite = TRUE)  # Purge server dataset cto_dataset_purge("mydata")  # Delete server dataset cto_dataset_delete("mydata")

title: A Modern and Flexible Data Pipeline for SurveyCTO
text: Retrieve server configuration helper files.
code: # Get server metadata meta <- cto_metadata()  # Generate a Stata template for a form cto_form_languages("myform")  # Get a printable version of the form cto_form_printable("myform")  # Get a mail-merge template of the form cto_form_mail_template

title: A Modern and Flexible Data Pipeline for SurveyCTO
text: package independent, open-source project. affiliated , endorsed , maintained SurveyCTO Dobility, Inc. Use risk, always ensure handle survey credentials participant data securely.

what: Connect to and manage a SurveyCTO Server connection — cto_connect
title: Connect to and manage a SurveyCTO Server connection — cto_connect
text: cto_connect() authenticates SurveyCTO server, verifies credentials, handles cookies. cto_set_connection() manually sets restores existing session object. cto_is_connected() checks active session currently exists internal environment.

title: Connect to and manage a SurveyCTO Server connection — cto_connect
code: cto_connect(server, username, password = NULL, cookies = TRUE)  cto_set_connection(session)  cto_is_connected()

title: Connect to and manage a SurveyCTO Server connection — cto_connect
text: server String. subdomain SurveyCTO server. example, full URL https://-org.surveycto.com, set "-org". username String. username email address associated account. password String. user password. left NULL (recommended), prompts password interactively. cookies Logical. TRUE (default), client preserves cookies across requests handles CSRF tokens automatically. required maintaining stateful sessions access endpoints available REST API. session cto_session object previously created cto_connect().

title: Connect to and manage a SurveyCTO Server connection — cto_connect
text: cto_connect(): session object (invisibly). cto_set_connection(): NULL (invisibly), called side effect setting session. cto_is_connected(): logical TRUE FALSE.

title: Connect to and manage a SurveyCTO Server connection — cto_connect
text: default, package operates statefully preserving cookies connection established cookies = TRUE argument. Upon successful authentication, request object (.session) assigned internal package environment (.ctoclient_env). Therefore, need pass request object functions package; automatically use active session. working multiple servers, please use cto_set_connection() switch server connection.

title: Connect to and manage a SurveyCTO Server connection — cto_connect
text: highly recommended avoid hard-coding passwords scripts. Interactive Session: Pass password securely via console input (leave NULL) keychain management tools. Automation/Scripts: Store credentials .Renviron file (e.g., SCTO_PASSWORD) retrieve Sys.getenv().

title: Connect to and manage a SurveyCTO Server connection — cto_connect
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # 1. Standard authentication cto_connect("my-org", "user@org.com", Sys.getenv("SCTO_PASSWORD"))  # 2. Check if connected cto_is_connected()  # 3. Recommended for interactive use con <- cto_connect("my-org", "user@org.com")  # 4. Restore and existing connection cto_set_connection(con) } # }

what: Create or Upload to Server Datasets — cto_dataset_create
title: Create or Upload to Server Datasets — cto_dataset_create
text: functions manage lifecycle SurveyCTO server datasets: creating container definition populating data. cto_dataset_create(): Creates new dataset specified configuration. cto_dataset_upload(): Uploads records CSV file specified dataset. Supports: APPEND: add new records MERGE: update existing records based unique field CLEAR: replace data

title: Create or Upload to Server Datasets — cto_dataset_create
code: cto_dataset_create(   id,   title = id,   discriminator = NULL,   unique_record_field = NULL,   allow_offline_updates = NULL,   id_format_options = list(prefix = NULL, allowCapitalLetters = NULL, suffix = NULL,     numberOfDigits = NULL),   cases_management_options = list(otherUserCode = NULL, showFinalizedSentWhenTree = NULL,     enumeratorDatasetId = NULL, showColumnsWhenTable = NULL, displayMode = NULL,     entryMode = NULL),   location_context = list(parentGroupId = 1, siblingBelow = list(itemClass = NULL, id =     NULL), siblingAbove = list(itemClass = NULL, id = NULL)) )  cto_dataset_upload(   id,   file,   upload_mode = c("APPEND", "MERGE", "CLEAR"),   joining_field = NULL )

title: Create or Upload to Server Datasets — cto_dataset_create
text: id String. unique identifier dataset (e.g., "household_data"). title String. display title dataset. Defaults id. discriminator String. type dataset create. unique_record_field String. name field uniquely identifies records. Required upload_mode "merge". allow_offline_updates Logical. Whether dataset allows updates offline. id_format_options List. Options formatting IDs within dataset. cases_management_options List. Specific configurations case management location_context List. Metadata regarding dataset resides. file String. Path local CSV file upload. upload_mode String. data handled. joining_field String. column name used match records "merge". Often unique_record_field.

title: Create or Upload to Server Datasets — cto_dataset_create
text: list containing API response (metadata creation, job summary upload).

title: Create or Upload to Server Datasets — cto_dataset_create
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # 1. Create the container cto_dataset_create( id = "hh_data", title = "Household Data", unique_record_field = "hh_id" )  # 2. Upload data to it cto_dataset_upload( file = "data.csv", id = "hh_data", upload_mode = "merge", joining_field = "hh_id" ) } # }

what: Delete or Purge a Dataset — cto_dataset_delete
title: Delete or Purge a Dataset — cto_dataset_delete
text: Functions permanently remove data server. cto_delete_dataset(): Permanently deletes dataset associated data. operation undone cto_purge_dataset(): Removes records dataset keeps dataset definition (schema/ID) intact.

title: Delete or Purge a Dataset — cto_dataset_delete
code: cto_dataset_delete(id)  cto_dataset_purge(id)

title: Delete or Purge a Dataset — cto_dataset_delete
text: id String. unique identifier dataset.

title: Delete or Purge a Dataset — cto_dataset_delete
text: list confirming operation status.

title: Delete or Purge a Dataset — cto_dataset_delete
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # 1. Delete dataset cto_dataset_delete(id = "hh_data")  # 2. Purge dataset cto_dataset_purge(id = "hh_data") } # }

title: Download SurveyCTO Server Datasets — cto_dataset_download
text: Downloads one datasets SurveyCTO server local directory CSV files.

title: Download SurveyCTO Server Datasets — cto_dataset_download
code: cto_dataset_download(id = NULL, dir = getwd(), overwrite = FALSE)

title: Download SurveyCTO Server Datasets — cto_dataset_download
text: id character vector dataset IDs download. NULL (default), function queries server list available datasets downloads . dir string specifying directory CSV files saved. Defaults current working directory. overwrite Logical. TRUE, existing files dir overwritten. FALSE (default), existing files skipped conserve bandwidth.

title: Download SurveyCTO Server Datasets — cto_dataset_download
text: (Invisibly) character vector file paths successfully downloaded CSVs. Returns NULL datasets found.

title: Download SurveyCTO Server Datasets — cto_dataset_download
text: Smart Downloading: overwrite = FALSE, function checks target file already exists dir skips download. Error Handling: specific dataset fails download, warning printed dataset name, function continues processing remaining list.

title: Download SurveyCTO Server Datasets — cto_dataset_download
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # --- Example 1: Download a specific dataset --- paths <- cto_dataset_download(id = "household_data", dir = tempdir()) df <- read.csv(paths[1])  # --- Example 2: Download all datasets, skip existing files --- paths <- cto_dataset_download(dir = "my_data_folder", overwrite = FALSE) } # }

title: Get Dataset Properties — cto_dataset_info
text: Retrieves detailed metadata specific dataset, including configuration, schema, status.

title: Get Dataset Properties — cto_dataset_info
code: cto_dataset_info(id)

title: Get Dataset Properties — cto_dataset_info
text: id String. unique identifier dataset.

title: Get Dataset Properties — cto_dataset_info
text: list containing dataset properties.

title: Get Dataset Properties — cto_dataset_info
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ ds_info <- cto_dataset_info(id = "hh_data") } # }

title: List Available Server Datasets — cto_dataset_list
text: Retrieves list datasets authenticated user access . Results can filtered team ordered specified fields.

title: List Available Server Datasets — cto_dataset_list
code: cto_dataset_list(   order_by = "createdOn",   sort = c("ASC", "DESC"),   team_id = NULL )

title: List Available Server Datasets — cto_dataset_list
text: order_by String. field sort results . Options : "id", "title", "createdOn", "modifiedOn", "status", "version", "discriminator". Defaults "createdOn". sort String. direction sort: "asc" (ascending) "desc" (descending). Defaults "asc". team_id String (Optional). Filter datasets specific Team ID. provided, datasets accessible team returned. Example: 'team-456'.

title: List Available Server Datasets — cto_dataset_list
text: data frame containing metadata available datasets.

title: List Available Server Datasets — cto_dataset_list
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # List all datasets sorted by creation date ds_list <- cto_dataset_list()  # List datasets for a specific team, ordered by title team_ds <- cto_dataset_list(team_id = "team-123", order_by = "title") } # }

what: Download Attachments from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_attachment
title: Download Attachments from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_attachment
text: Downloads files attached deployed SurveyCTO form, preloaded CSV files, media assets, server-side attachments.

title: Download Attachments from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_attachment
code: cto_form_attachment(form_id, filename = NULL, dir = getwd(), overwrite = FALSE)

title: Download Attachments from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_attachment
text: form_id string specifying SurveyCTO form ID. filename Optional character vector specific filenames download (e.g., "prices.csv"). NULL (default), available attachments associated form downloaded. dir string giving directory files saved. Defaults getwd(). overwrite Logical; TRUE, existing files dir overwritten. FALSE (default), existing files skipped.

title: Download Attachments from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_attachment
text: character vector file paths available attachments exist locally function completes (invisibly). Returns invisible(NULL) form attachments.

title: Download Attachments from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_attachment
text: function first calls cto_form_metadata() retrieve metadata deployed form, including list available attachments. File types: attached file type can downloaded (example, images, audio, CSV files). Progress reporting: options(scto.verbose = TRUE) (default), progress messages printed using CLI framework. Caching: Files re-downloaded already exist dir unless overwrite = TRUE. requested files available, function aborts informative message suggesting inspect form metadata.

title: Download Attachments from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_attachment
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ files <- cto_form_attachment("household_survey")  # 2. Download specific files to a local directory cto_form_attachment(   form_id  = "household_survey",   filename = c("item_list.csv", "logo.png"),   dir      = "data/raw" )  # 3. Force re-download of a file p <- cto_form_attachment(   form_id  = "household_survey",   filename = "prices.csv",   overwrite = TRUE )  prices <- read.csv(p) } # }

what: Download and Tidy SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data
title: Download and Tidy SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data
text: Downloads submission data SurveyCTO server wide JSON format. Encrypted forms supported via private key. tidy = TRUE (default), function uses form's XLSForm definition convert variables appropriate R types, drop structural fields, organize columns analysis.

title: Download and Tidy SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data
code: cto_form_data(   form_id,   private_key = NULL,   start_date = as.POSIXct("2000-01-01"),   status = c("approved", "rejected", "pending"),   tidy = TRUE )

title: Download and Tidy SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data
text: form_id string specifying SurveyCTO form ID. private_key optional path .pem private key file. Required form encrypted. start_date POSIXct timestamp. submissions received date/time requested. Defaults "2000-01-01". status character vector submission statuses include. Must subset "approved", "rejected", "pending". Defaults three. tidy Logical; TRUE, attempts clean restructure raw SurveyCTO output using XLSForm definition.

title: Download and Tidy SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data
text: data.frame containing downloaded submissions. tidy = FALSE, raw parsed JSON response returned. tidy = TRUE, cleaned version standardized column types ordering returned. Returns empty data.frame submissions available.

title: Download and Tidy SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data
text: tidy = TRUE, function performs several common post-processing steps: Type conversion: Converts numeric, date, datetime fields native R types based question types XLSForm. Structural cleanup: Removes layout-fields notes, group markers, repeat delimiters. Column ordering: Places key submission metadata (example, completion submission dates) first, followed survey variables form order. Media fields: Strips URLs image, audio, video fields, leaving filename. Geopoints: Splits geopoint variables four columns _latitude, _longitude, _altitude, _accuracy suffixes already present.

title: Download and Tidy SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Download raw submissions raw <- cto_form_data("my_form_id", tidy = FALSE)  # Download and tidy encrypted data clean <- cto_form_data("my_form_id", private_key = "keys/my_key.pem") } # }

what: Download Attachments from SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data_attachment
title: Download Attachments from SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data_attachment
text: Extracts attachment URLs (images, audio, video, signatures) SurveyCTO form data downloads files local directory. function handles encrypted forms private key provided.

title: Download Attachments from SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data_attachment
code: cto_form_data_attachment(   form_id,   fields = everything(),   private_key = NULL,   dir = file.path(getwd(), "media"),   overwrite = FALSE )

title: Download Attachments from SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data_attachment
text: form_id string specifying SurveyCTO form ID inspect. fields tidy-select expression (e.g., everything(), starts_with("img_")) specifying columns scanned attachment URLs. Defaults everything(). private_key Optional. character string specifying path local RSA private key file. Required form encrypted. dir character string specifying local directory files saved. Defaults "media". directory must exist. overwrite Logical. TRUE, existing files name dir overwritten. FALSE (default), existing files skipped.

title: Download Attachments from SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data_attachment
text: Returns vector file paths (invisibly). function called side effect downloading files local disk.

title: Download Attachments from SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data_attachment
text: function performs following steps: Fetches form data using cto_form_data. Scans selected fields values matching standard SurveyCTO API attachment URL pattern. Downloads identified files sequentially specified dir.

title: Download Attachments from SurveyCTO Form Data — cto_form_data_attachment
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # 1. Download all attachments from the form submissions cto_form_data_attachment(   form_id = "household_survey_v1",   dir = "downloads/medias" )  # 2. Download only specific image fields from an encrypted form cto_form_data_attachment(   form_id = "encrypted_health_survey",   fields = starts_with("image_"),   private_key = "keys/my_priv_key.pem",   overwrite = TRUE ) } # }

what: Generate a Stata Do-File with Variable and Value Labels from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_dofile
title: Generate a Stata Do-File with Variable and Value Labels from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_dofile
text: Creates Stata .file applies variable labels, value labels, notes dataset based XLSForm definition SurveyCTO form. function supports multi-language forms, repeat groups, select_multiple questions, generates Stata-compatible regular expressions labels applied indexed variables.

title: Generate a Stata Do-File with Variable and Value Labels from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_dofile
code: cto_form_dofile(form_id, path = NULL)

title: Generate a Stata Do-File with Variable and Value Labels from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_dofile
text: form_id character string specifying SurveyCTO form ID. path Optional character string giving output file path generated .file. Must end .. NULL, file written disk generated commands returned invisibly.

title: Generate a Stata Do-File with Variable and Value Labels from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_dofile
text: character vector containing lines generated Stata .file. value returned invisibly.

title: Generate a Stata Do-File with Variable and Value Labels from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_dofile
text: function performs several processing steps: Language selection: Automatically chooses default language defined XLSForm, falls back English multiple label columns present. Value labels: Generates Stata label define commands select_one choice lists binary label set select_multiple variables. Repeat handling: variables inside repeat groups, Stata loops regex matching created labels apply indexed copies (example, child_age_1, child_age_2). Select-multiple expansion: Produces conditional labeling logic binary indicator variables derived select_multiple questions. Label cleaning: Removes HTML markup, escapes Stata-special characters, normalizes whitespace, preserves SurveyCTO interpolation strings ${var}.

title: Generate a Stata Do-File with Variable and Value Labels from a SurveyCTO Form — cto_form_dofile
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Generate a Stata do-file and write it to disk cto_form_dofile("household_survey", path = "labels.do")  # Generate without writing to a file cmds <- cto_form_dofile("household_survey") } # }

what: Download SurveyCTO Form Files and Templates — cto_form_languages
title: Download SurveyCTO Form Files and Templates — cto_form_languages
text: functions retrieve auxiliary files templates associated deployed SurveyCTO form. functions require stateful session work. cto_form_languages() retrieves list languages defined form. cto_form_stata_template() downloads Stata .file template importing submitted data. cto_form_printable() downloads printable (HTML) version form definition. cto_form_mail_template() downloads mail merge template form. downloads saved locally file paths returned invisibly.

title: Download SurveyCTO Form Files and Templates — cto_form_languages
code: cto_form_languages(form_id)  cto_form_stata_template(   form_id,   dir = getwd(),   lang = NULL,   csv_dir = NULL,   dta_dir = NULL )  cto_form_printable(   form_id,   dir = getwd(),   lang = NULL,   relevancies = FALSE,   constraints = FALSE )  cto_form_mail_template(form_id, dir = getwd(), type = 2, group_names = FALSE)

title: Download SurveyCTO Form Files and Templates — cto_form_languages
text: form_id character string giving unique SurveyCTO form ID. dir character string specifying directory downloaded files saved. Defaults current working directory. lang Optional character string giving language identifier (example, "English"). NULL, form's default language used. csv_dir Optional character string giving directory CSV dataset eventually stored. value embedded generated Stata .file automate data loading. dta_dir Optional character string giving directory Stata .dta file written template. relevancies Logical; TRUE, relevance logic (skip patterns) included printable form. Defaults FALSE. constraints Logical; TRUE, constraint logic included printable form. Defaults FALSE. type Integer (0–2) specifying format mail merge template: 0: Field names . 1: Field labels . 2: field names labels. group_names Logical; TRUE, group names included variable headers. Defaults FALSE.

title: Download SurveyCTO Form Files and Templates — cto_form_languages
text: cto_form_languages() returns list containing available languages index default language (1-based). functions return local file path downloaded file, invisibly.

title: Download SurveyCTO Form Files and Templates — cto_form_languages
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ form <- "household_survey"  # 1. List available form languages langs <- cto_form_languages(form) print(langs)  # 2. Download a Stata import template # Provide future CSV/DTA locations so the .do file is ready to run cto_form_stata_template(   form_id = form,   dir     = "downloads/",   csv_dir = "C:/Data",   dta_dir = "C:/Data" )  # 3. Download a printable form with logic displayed cto_form_printable(   form_id      = form,   dir          = "documentation/",   relevancies  = TRUE,   constraints  = TRUE )  # 4. Download a mail-merge template cto_form_mail_template(   form_id = form,   dir     = "templates/",   type    = 2 ) } # }

what: Download SurveyCTO Form Metadata and Definitions — cto_form_metadata
title: Download SurveyCTO Form Metadata and Definitions — cto_form_metadata
text: Functions interacting SurveyCTO form definitions. cto_form_metadata() retrieves raw metadata form, including available definition files, version identifiers, download URLs. cto_form_definition() downloads specific XLSForm definition (Excel file) local directory.

title: Download SurveyCTO Form Metadata and Definitions — cto_form_metadata
code: cto_form_metadata(form_id)  cto_form_definition(form_id, version = NULL, dir = getwd(), overwrite = FALSE)

title: Download SurveyCTO Form Metadata and Definitions — cto_form_metadata
text: form_id string giving unique SurveyCTO form ID. version Optional string specifying particular form version download. NULL (default), currently deployed version used. dir Directory XLSForm saved. Defaults getwd(). overwrite Logical; TRUE, existing file dir overwritten. FALSE (default), existing file used.

title: Download SurveyCTO Form Metadata and Definitions — cto_form_metadata
text: cto_form_metadata() returns list containing metadata, including keys deployedGroupFiles previousDefinitionFiles. cto_form_definition() returns character string path downloaded Excel file.

title: Download SurveyCTO Form Metadata and Definitions — cto_form_metadata
text: Version Handling: version supplied, validated available versions cto_form_metadata(). informative error raised requested version exist. Caching: file already exists dir, re-downloaded unless overwrite = TRUE.

title: Download SurveyCTO Form Metadata and Definitions — cto_form_metadata
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # --- 1. Get raw metadata --- meta <- cto_form_metadata("household_survey")  # --- 2. Download the current form definition --- file_path <- cto_form_definition("household_survey")  # --- 3. Download a specific historical version --- file_path_v <- cto_form_definition(   "household_survey",   version = "20231001" )  # --- 4. Read XLSForm manually with readxl --- library(readxl) survey <- read_excel(file_path, sheet = "survey") choices <- read_excel(file_path, sheet = "choices") settings <- read_excel(file_path, sheet = "settings") } # }

what: Retrieve Server Metadata and Resource Lists — cto_metadata
title: Retrieve Server Metadata and Resource Lists — cto_metadata
text: functions retrieve various metadata lists resources (forms, groups, teams, roles, users) SurveyCTO server. cto_metadata(): Retrieves combined structure forms, groups, datasets (legacy console endpoint). cto_form_ids(): Returns simple vector form IDs. cto_group_list(): Lists form groups. cto_team_list(): Lists available team IDs. cto_role_list(): Lists defined user roles. cto_user_list(): Lists users server.

title: Retrieve Server Metadata and Resource Lists — cto_metadata
code: cto_form_ids()  cto_metadata(which = c("all", "datasets", "forms", "groups"))  cto_group_list(   order_by = c("createdOn", "id", "title"),   sort = c("ASC", "DESC"),   parent_group_id = NULL )  cto_team_list()  cto_role_list(   order_by = c("createdOn", "id", "title", "createdBy"),   sort = c("ASC", "DESC") )  cto_user_list(   order_by = c("createdOn", "username", "roleId", "modifiedOn"),   sort = c("ASC", "DESC"),   role_id = NULL )

title: Retrieve Server Metadata and Resource Lists — cto_metadata
text: String. Specifies subset metadata return cto_metadata(). One : "" (default): Returns list containing groups, datasets, forms. "groups": Returns data frame form groups. "datasets": Returns data frame server datasets. "forms": Returns data frame deployed forms. order_by String. Field sort results . Available fields vary function (e.g., "createdOn", "id", "title", "username"). sort String. Sort direction: "ASC" (ascending) "DESC" (descending). parent_group_id Number (Optional). Filter groups parent group ID. role_id String (Optional). Filter users specific Role ID.

title: Retrieve Server Metadata and Resource Lists — cto_metadata
text: return value depends function: cto_form_ids() cto_team_list() return character vector IDs. cto_metadata() returns list (= "") data frame. cto_group_list(), cto_role_list(), cto_user_list() return list data frame requested resources (depending pagination handling).

title: Retrieve Server Metadata and Resource Lists — cto_metadata
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # --- 1. Basic Metadata --- # Get all form IDs as a vector ids <- cto_form_ids()  # Get detailed metadata about forms meta_forms <- cto_metadata("forms")  # --- 2.
